is_observer.description: Was user an observer in this battle. True - was, False - wasn't

time_presence.description: User presence time on arena (in seconds)

achievements.description: User's achievements and ribbons in battle

num_global.description: Number of battle for this current spa_id. All battle types included

num_mode.description: Number of battle in this battle type for this current spa_id. Only battle in this battle type increase counter

is_calibration.description: Is battle in calibration set. True - is, False - isn't

rating_end.description: Battle raiting of user at the battle end (not MMR - raiting in interface)

battle_efficiency.description: Battle user efficiency. Used for raiting calculation but its NOT raiting
